task.title: Simplified User Interface
task.shortdesc: A simplified user interface (SUI) is a visual representation of a software interface that removes unimportant elements and reduces them to simpler shapes. Check how to create SUI and where to use it.

context.p: It is hard to imagine any complicated system documentation without screenshots of user interface. However, software updates are very frequent. These regular updates, coupled with localization processes, can make documentation work really challenging and time consuming.
How can we face these challenges without having to constantly update supporting content?
